```{r}

library(httr)
library(raster)
library(lubridate)

```

This Rmd scrapes data from HYCOM for salinity and SST in the Gulf of Mexico. Data available from HYCOM is at 3 hour time intervals daily for each year. This code:

* Allows your to choose which year of data to extract, the months you want to extract and which hours of the day to extract
* Creates average monthly minimum and maximum SST and salinity rasters for each year by taking the average of daily minimums and maximums for each month

#### HYCOM Gulf of Mexico 

Scrape netcdf data from "https://www.hycom.org/data/gomu0pt04/expt-50pt1"

```{r}

year_range <- c(2011) # set the year you want to look at
month_range <- c(5) # set the months
hours = c(0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, 21) # set the hours


for (year in year_range){
  folder = sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/", year)
  dir.create(folder, showWarnings = FALSE)
  
  for (month in month_range){
    
    av_temp_min_raster_file = sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/av_sst_min_%d-%02d.tif", year, year, month)
    av_temp_max_raster_file = sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/av_sst_max_%d-%02d.tif", year, year, month)
    av_sal_max_file = sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/av_sal_max_%d-%02d.tif", year, year, month)
    av_sal_min_file = sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/av_sal_min_%d-%02d.tif", year, year, month)
    
    if (!(file.exists(av_temp_min_raster_file) && file.exists(av_temp_max_raster_file) && file.exists(av_sal_max_file) && file.exists(av_sal_min_file))) {
      # get the number of days in each month
      num_days = days_in_month(as.Date(paste0(year, "-", month, "-01")))
      
      # make vectors
      month_temp_min = c()
      month_temp_max = c()
      month_sal_min = c()
      month_sal_max = c()
      
      for (day in 1:num_days) {
        
        day_data_temp = c()
        
        day_data_sal = c()
        
        for (hour in hours) {
          
          file_name = sprintf("hycom_gomu_501_%d%02d%02d00_t0%02d.nc", year, month, day, hour)
          file_path = sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/%s", year, file_name)
          downloaded = TRUE
          if (!file.exists(file_path)) {
            downloaded = FALSE
            url = sprintf("http://ncss.hycom.org/thredds/ncss/datasets/GOMu0.04/expt_50.1/data/netcdf/%d/%s?var=salinity&var=water_temp&disableLLSubset=on&disableProjSubset=on&horizStride=1&time_start=%d-%02d-%02dT%02d%%3A00%%3A00Z&time_end=%d-%02d-%02dT%02d%%3A00%%3A00Z&timeStride=1&vertCoord=&accept=netcdf", 
                        year, file_name, year, month, day, hour, year, month, day, hour) 
          
          # response
            r <- GET(url)
            
            # check if any errors, want status code to be 200
            print(sprintf("File: %s downloaded. Status code: %d", file_name, status_code(r)))
            
            if (status_code(r) == 200) {
            
            # save file
              bin <- content(r, "raw")
              writeBin(bin, sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/%s", year, file_name))
              downloaded = TRUE
            }
          }
          # generate url
          
          if (downloaded) {
            # extract sea surface temp and salinity
            sst <- brick(sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/%s", year, file_name), varname = "water_temp")
            salinity <- brick(sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/%s", year, file_name), varname = "salinity")
            
            # append to vector
            day_data_temp = c(day_data_temp, sst)
            day_data_sal = c(day_data_sal, salinity) 
          }
          
        }
      
        # stack the days  
       day_temp_stack <- raster::stack(day_data_temp)
       
       day_sal_stack <- raster::stack(day_data_sal)
        
       # get min and max raster
       temp_min <- min(day_temp_stack)
       temp_max <- max(day_temp_stack)
       sal_min <- min(day_sal_stack)
       sal_max <- max(day_sal_stack)
       
       # append
       month_temp_min = c(month_temp_min, temp_min)
       month_temp_max = c(month_temp_max, temp_max)
       month_sal_max = c(month_sal_max, sal_max)
       month_sal_min = c(month_sal_min, sal_min)
       
      }  
      
      
      # save files, average monthly rasters
      month_av_temp_min <- mean(stack(month_temp_min))
      writeRaster(month_av_temp_min, 
                  sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/av_sst_min_%d-%02d.tif", 
                          year, year, month))
      
      month_av_temp_max <- mean(stack(month_temp_max))
      writeRaster(month_av_temp_max, 
                  sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/av_sst_max_%d-%02d.tif", 
                          year, year, month))
      
      month_av_sal_max <- mean(stack(month_sal_max))
      writeRaster(month_av_sal_max, 
                  sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/av_sal_max_%d-%02d.tif", 
                          year, year, month))
      
       month_av_sal_min <- mean(stack(month_sal_min))
      writeRaster(month_av_sal_min, 
                  sprintf("/Users/annaclairemarley/Documents/github/gulf_seaweed_suit/data/HYCOM/Year_%d/av_sal_min_%d-%02d.tif", 
                          year, year, month))
    }
    # delete files
    for (file in list.files(folder, pattern = sprintf(".*%d%02d.*.nc$", year, month))) {
       
       file.remove(paste0(folder, file))
       
     }
  
  }
  
  
}
print("finish")

```
